General.Name: Golden Land Bhd
General.Description: Golden Land Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development activities in Malaysia and Indonesia. It is also involved in the cultivation of oil palm; provision of general contract construction and civil works; construction and trading activities; and provision of management services. The company was formerly known as Tanah Emas Corporation Berhad and changed its name to Golden Land Berhad in 2009. Golden Land Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
